quote_data.message: Great news! We've generated a preliminary quote for your 2022 Subaru Outback Wilderness. Your estimated annual premium is $1,216.50. This quote includes standard coverages (Bodily Injury: 100k/300k, Property Damage: 50k, Collision Deductible: $500, Comprehensive Deductible: $250). Please let us know if you'd like to adjust coverages or proceed.
